page.title: 12Schools in St.Davids(2)
page.content: In the Church in Wales School there are 4 teachers.Their names are Mrs.Watkins,Mrs.Simpson,Mrs.Saunders and Mr.Griffiths(the Headteacher). Mrs.Watkins takes the reception class,Mrs.Simpson takes the Infants,Mrs.Saunders takes the lower juniors and Mr.Griffiths takes the upper juniors.Both the primary schools have a canteen down the road where you can have packed lunch too. In your seven years in the primary,you learn:English,Maths,Science,Welsh,Art and Environmental Studies.At 11 years old you go to Ysgol Dewi Sant.You have lots of subjects there and choose any you like.The Headmaster is called Mr.James and there are about 30 staff working there.There is a tennis court and swimming pool in the school and lots of fields to play football and other sports in.
